name: RainbowLink Inc.
overview:
RainbowLink Inc. is a software vendor. “Marketing Solutions” is in RainbowLink Inc.’s line. To be concrete:

  • Branding
  • Internet Marketing
  • Sales Automation

RainbowLink Inc. is a Software Vendor. RainbowLink Inc. has created software since 2005. RainbowLink Inc. bought a domain, “Rainbow-Link.com”, in 2008. RainbowLink Inc. has sold Software that RainbowLink Inc. created and tested as Secure Online Services at RainbowLink Inc.’s Own Data Center since 1st July in 2009.

RainbowLink Inc. sells online services ( Software as a Service = “SaaS” ) to promote business activities with minimizing a risk. RainbowLink Inc.’s services are driven by software RainbowLink Inc. developed. And RainbowLink Inc. provides services on RainbowLink Inc.’s own data center. All of the software as services does not depend on any javascript or cookie. RainbowLink Inc. protects customers’ data saved in RainbowLink Inc.’s own data center via the SaaS provided by RainbowLink Inc. within fee of the SaaS.

RainbowLink Inc. sells the software after test-running for 5 months ( longest 3 years ) on the RealEnvironment. Instead of meeting sales, RainbowLink Inc. provides an automated setting system, the “RL-Start-Steps®”, and and automated Estimate system of initial setting expense. By these automated systems, RainbowLink Inc. can sell Software as a Service for low price.

☼ At CrunchBase RainbowLink Inc. introduces it’s FREE Marketing applications only! Enjoy!!
